text:
Summer produce is the best. Love the taste and colors — a feast for the senses!
Combine the food with the other features of the season: sunshine, green-grass-barefoot picnics, ultimate frisbee matches, running and playing with a dog, etc, and it's pretty much perfection. ♥️
I neeeeeeeed Italian food. Need. I took this shot before I ate this food. Amazing. So good. Definitely coming here again.

salt & straw

Interesting ice cream. New age flavors like: 
• Strawberry honey balsamic with black pepper
• Olive Oil
• IPA ice cream. Seriously. Tasted like a frozen IPA. 

This is the blondie with their salted caramel ice cream. They make all their ice cream with butterfat and it is pretty delicious.

Trip to New York
We had a great time in New York sampling the sights, sounds, and tastes of the "city that never sleeps." Lovely, lovely, lovely.
Here are some aerial shots from the plane. Loved the fly over the town center. Such a unique view of the area.
Today I am grateful for the sunshine.
